Visual.title: Visual Learner
Visual.speciality: You learn best through images, charts, and diagrams.
suggestions: Use mind maps to organize your thoughts.
Highlight important information in different colors.

Auditory.title: Auditory Learner
Auditory.speciality: You retain information better through listening and speaking.

Reading/Writing.title: Reading/Writing Learner
Reading/Writing.speciality: You excel when reading and writing notes.
suggestions: Summarize key points in your own words.

Kinesthetic.title: Kinesthetic Learner
Kinesthetic.speciality: You understand concepts best through hands-on activities.
suggestions: Engage in practical exercises and experiments.
Use physical objects to represent concepts.
Take frequent breaks and move while studying.
